CustomField.description: Sum of number of Received/Received as Unconditional Pledge Opportunities (hard/soft credit) this FY for all Account Contacts: excl. in-kind/planned gifts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total count of all received Opportunities where the Close Date is this FY and Account has a hard or soft credit. (Planned Gifts not included).
CustomField.label: # of Donations this FY
